info.title: ParkIt API
info.description: API for managing parkings and authentication in the ParkIt application

post.description: Registers a new user with the provided details and returns a JWT token.
Authenticates a user with the provided credentials and returns a JWT token.
Logs out the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all categories.

post.description: Creates a new category with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

put.description: Updates a category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

delete.description: Deletes a category by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

get.description: Retrieves statistics for the dashboard, including total plants, orders, ordered plants, and clients.
Retrieves a list of orders. If the user is a client, only their orders are returned.

post.description: Creates a new order with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves an order by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

put.description: Updates an order by its ID. Clients can only cancel their own pending orders.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the order to update

message.example: You are not allowed to update this order

get.description: Retrieves a list of all plants.

post.description: Creates a new plant with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a plant by its slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the plant to retrieve

put.description: Updates a plant by its slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the plant to update

delete.description: Deletes a plant by its slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the plant to delete
